description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the Microsoft AllJoyn API denial of service vulnerability (CVE-2024-20687):

1. Download and apply the appropriate security updates from the Microsoft Update Catalog.
2. Ensure that your system matches one of the specified impacted build numbers.
3. Restart your system after installation to apply the changes.

**Details**:
- Relevant KB Articles include: KB5034134, KB5034123, KB5034122, KB5034121.
- Updates can be found at the following links:
  - [KB5034134 Update](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034134)
  - [KB5034123 Update](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034123)
  - [KB5034122 Update](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034122)
  - [KB5034121 Update](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034121)

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure your device is running an impacted version of Windows as detailed in the update list.
- Backup critical data before applying updates to avoid potential data loss.
